description:
Extracted from the PanCancer Atlas initiative on the GDC in Sept 2016 (file name pancan.merged.v0.2.5.filtered.maf.gz). Contains Somatic mutation calls.    

Note: Data was filtered such that the only rows with the Variant_Classification in {Frame_Shift_Del, Frame_Shift_Ins, In_Frame_Del, In_Frame_Ins, Missense_Mutation, Nonsense_Mutation, Nonstop_Mutation, Splice_Site, Translation_Start_Site} were retained (Consistent with e.g. ISB, MSKCC, Broad definition of mutated gene). Moreover, Additional annotations were added (e.g. ParticipantBarcode). FPPP project aliquots were removed, and Rows with a solid tissue normal reference were removed if a corresponding blood derived normal reference was available.   

More details https://gdc.cancer.gov/about-data/publications/PanCan-MYC-2018. This table has been deprecated. It has been copied to isb-cgc-bq.pancancer_atlas.Filtered_MC3_MAF_V5_one_per_tumor_sample.

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: Original TCGA tumor sample barcode.TCGA-WC-A885-01A, TCGA-HQ-A2OF-01A.
fields.name: Tumor_SampleBarcode

fields.description: Original TCGA tumor aliquote barcode. Examples: TCGA-WC-A885-01A,TCGA-XF-AAN3-01A
fields.name: Tumor_AliquotBarcode

fields.description: Sample Barcode For The Normal Tissue. Examples: TCGA-V4-A9EI-10A, TCGA-V4-A9EI-10A
fields.name: Normal_SampleBarcode

fields.description: Aliquot Barcode For The Normal Tissue. Examples: TCGA-CR-7385-10A-01D-2013-08, TCGA-DX-A3M1-10A-01D-A22A-09
fields.name: Normal_AliquotBarcode

fields.description: Sample Type Letter Code. The subset of 4 values currently used are: NBC, NB, NT, NBM. See https://Gdc.Cancer.Gov/Resources-Tcga-Users/Tcga-Code-Tables/Sample-Type-Codes
fields.name: Normal_SampleTypeLetterCode

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). "Unknown" is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene
fields.name: Hugo_Symbol

fields.description: Protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes. "p.=" signifies no change in the protein
fields.name: HGVSp_Short

fields.description: Translational effect of variant allele; eg. Missense_Mutation, Nonsense_Mutation, etc.
fields.name: Variant_Classification

fields.description: The coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format
fields.name: HGVSc

fields.description: One or more genome sequencing center reporting the variant
fields.name: CENTERS

fields.description: List of failed filters (if any), or "PASS" indicating the variant has passed all filters.
fields.name: FILTER
